summary:
This pack adds three new sets of long robes with matching gloves and boots to the game, for both male and female characters:

The Spellthief Robes, which can be Unarmored or Light armor. The Battlemage Robes, which can be Unarmored or Heavy Armor and The Royal Warlock Robes.
descriptionHtml:
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Description:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

This pack adds three new sets of long robes to the game, for male and female characters:

[b][color=#f9cb9c]The Spellthief Robes:[/color] [/b]Includes Robes, Boots and Gloves. Can be crafted as [u]unarmored or Light armor.[/u]
[color=#93c47d]
[b]The Battlemage Robes:[/b][/color] Includes Robes, Boots and Gloves. Can be crafted as [u]unarmored or Heavy Armor.[/u]

[color=#ea9999][b]The Royal Warlock Robes:[/b][/color] Includes Robes and Gloves. Can only be crafted as [u]unarmored.[/u]

[u]All of these robes for both genders and are craftable and enchantable.[/u]

To bypass body compatibility the robes use the Vanilla long robes mesh, with new textures assigned to them, so they will work with whatever replacer you're using. This means they're virtually compatible with every single body replacer, be it UNP, CBBE, 7B, CHSBHC, OMG, UNPB, WTF and any other random combination of letters you can think about

If you want, however, there's an optional file in the downloads section with the meshes I've used in the screenshots. Be mindful that said meshes are designed for UNP/UNPB.



[center][b][size=2][size=3][i]My other works:[/i][/size]

[/size][/b][i][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/?]Human Eyes - 50 New High-Res Eyes[/url][/size][/i][b][size=2]
[/size][/b][i][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948/?]Lind's Elven Eyes - 40 New High-Res Eyes[/url][/size][/i]

[b][i]Robes Texture Replacers:[/i][/b][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72751/?]Robes of Vaermina[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71249/?]Black - The Warlock[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36817/?]Monk - Priest of the Divines[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70920/?]Green - The Bosmer Mage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36078/?]Red - The Battlemage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59734/?]Blue - Court Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59769/?]Brown - The Wandering Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36173/?]Grey - The Moth Priest[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36049/?]Necromancer Robes - The King of Worms[/url]

[url=http://lindsworkshop.tumblr.com/]You can stay updated on what I'm doing through my Tumblr.

[img]http://s18.postimg.org/gnyqvvwll/Tumblr_Lind.jpg[/img][/url]

I've read the messages saying that, to put it politely, some of you don't fancy Tumblr, [url=https://twitter.com/LindsRealm]so I just made this.

[img]https://s24.postimg.org/qey3j9tp1/Twitter.png[/img]
[/url]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]More Informations:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://s15.postimg.org/halwdwt4r/Battlemage_Small.jpg[/img][/center]
- The normal version requires the [color=#6aa84f][b]Mage Armor[/b] (Alteration tree)[/color] perk to be crafted.

- The heavy armor version requires the first rank of the [color=#e06666][b][color=#3c78d8][color=#6fa8dc]Enchanter [/color][/color][/b][color=#3c78d8][color=#6fa8dc](Enchanting tree[/color]) [/color][/color]instead, since wearing Heavy Armor nullifies Mage Armor.

[center][img]http://s16.postimg.org/zc6lk1stx/RWarlocksmall.jpg[/img][/center]

Â - Requires the [color=#e06666][b]Apprentice Destruction[/b][/color] [color=#e06666](Destruction tree, duh.)[/color] perk to be crafted.


[center][img]http://s7.postimg.org/6n6ymujzf/image.jpg[/img][/center]

- Both variants Require at least the second rank of the [color=#45818e][b]Stealth[/b] (Sneak tree)[/color] perk.


[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/597175/?]You can see a Photoset by fgambler here.[/url][/center]

[i][center][b]03/19/2016[/b][/center][/i]
[center][img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/59a1d903c6b28885e08e16abb6ba1fdd/tumblr_o49dq5Etnf1tmuwnxo1_1280.jpg[/img]
[i][b]
Thank you! (:[/b][/i][/center]



[center]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Credits:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

Halofarm's Poser.
GomaPeroPero Poser.
exeter for adapting the vanilla mesh to UNP.


[center][i][b]To:

Mi. Gr. , Ti. Lo. , Angrylock[/b] , [b]vintagelf[/b][i][b], [i][b]Ge. Jo. Ry.[/b][/i][/b] [b], Da. Ta.[/b][/i]

Thank you for your donations, it was unexpected, but I really appreciated it. (:[/i]

[i]I'd love to add donators to the credits to show my appreciation, problem being through Paypal I can only see your name, not the username, so [u]message me if you'd like to be added![/u][/i][u]
[/u][/center]
-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Permissions:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[u][i]Please do not redistribute or edit this file without my approval.

You are free to showcase this file in YouTube videos and/or screenshots and/or mod reviews.

Thank you for downloading![/i][/u]
